tweet: Thank you @RedCross for once again hosting Holiday Mail for Heroes! Sending them Christmas cards of thanks is a small expression of our gratitude for their service. pic.twitter.com/8eS1JnvjwW
My heart goes out to my friend @JebBush and the entire Bush family. Thank you for sharing your dad with us. Sandy and I are praying for you all. 2/2

I am deeply saddened to hear of the passing of President George Bush. An American hero, he loved his family and country and dedicated his entire life to serving both. His legacy of integrity, patriotism, kindness, servant leadership is an example for us all. 1/2
